subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Heat’s star did not extend his streak of at least 30 points on 60 percent or better shooting, but lifted Miami to its sixth consecutive win over Oklahoma City, dating to the 2012 N.B.A. finals.
snippet: The Heat’s star did not extend his streak of at least 30 points on 60 percent or better shooting, but lifted Miami to its sixth consecutive win over Oklahoma City, dating to the 2012 N.B.A. finals.
